item.title: Agile Infection Growing
item.description: This is a bloody good idea. It builds upon my own Virgoen tendancies to write lists and tick things off, but what the list model lacks is the “in progress” state. Plus occasionally my lists get confused. See today’s notebook page:ThursdayFix bugs in Test DirectorMerge fixes upDo buildMerge downRead terms of contractE-mail solicitorGo to Robert DyasOrder DAB RadioFinish business analysis docsCarry on with QCon note consolidationHow do I know which ones I’ve started?
